vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.3.7;
daughter of: Aiah (H0345H); married to Saul (H7586G);
mother of: Armoni (H0764) and Mephibosheth (H4648H)
§ Rizpah = "pavement"
a concubine of king Saul and mother of Armoni and Mephibosheth
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   pavimento embaldosado; (2)   hija de Aiá; concubina del rey Saúl
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利斯巴 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "鋪好的路"
掃羅王的一個妃子, 她是亞摩尼和米非波設的母親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利斯巴 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "铺好的路"
扫罗王的一个妃子, 她是亚摩尼和米非波设的母亲
